info.title: Bachelor/Accounting - Tax Specialty/ Sukhishvili University, Gori
info.description: During this four-year program at Sukhishvili University, I acquired a comprehensive understanding of accounting principles with a specialized focus on tax regulations. The curriculum covered a range of accounting practices, financial management, and taxation laws, providing a solid foundation in analyzing financial data and interpreting tax codes. This education equipped me with the skills necessary for effective financial management, tax planning, and compliance in the professional sphere.

info.title: Certificate/Front End Development/ Business and Technology University
info.description: The Front-End Development certificate from the Business and Technology program provided an immersive introduction to the world of web development. This course equipped me with the fundamental skills in coding languages such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, enabling me to create dynamic and interactive web interfaces. It was an exciting and entirely new area for me, and I found a genuine passion in crafting digital experiences. I'm enthusiastic about furthering my expertise in this field and integrating it into my professional pursuits.
